idea:
We are a family run business based in Mumbai, India that has been built on creative energy and a long tradition of helping people and serving many industries including Oil & Gas, Medical, Automotive, and Mechanical. 


Since our establishment, our product line has expanded to cover almost any conceivable primary and secondary instrument and valve application for a variety of process industries, and precision turned parts. We specialize in the design, development, and manufacturing of high quality instrumentation and high pressure product solutions.

Some of our key products area
* Instrumentation Tube Fittings
* Precision Pipe Fittings
* Ball Valves
* Needle Valves
* Instrument Manifolds
* Monoflange Valves
* Condensate Pots
* Precision Turned Parts

We manufacture them in SS 316, SS 316L, SS 321, Duplex2205,Titanium, Alloy 400, Alloy 625, Alloy C-276.

From standard products to custom designed and manufactured solutions, at Baldota we look forward to serving you to the best of our knowledge and expertise.
name: BALDOTA INSTRUMENTS AND FITTINGS LLP

idea:
The start-up is trying to solve the last mile connectivity problems faced by consumers including unreliable mobile data, unreliable bandwidth availability, etc.

The solution shifts the last mile connectivity over internet bandwidth to last mile connectivity over LAN, thereby making content delivery more reliable, faster and scalable.
name: MARGO NETWORKS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
CONVERT YOUR MOBILE PHONE INTO A POWERFUL LIFE-SAVING DEVICE

PERSONAL SAFETY AND DISASTER MANAGEMENT APP FOR SAVING LIVES OF PEOPLE AND PROPERTY ANYWHERE IN THE WORLD


Objectives of our Bloodyfast mobile app

1) To reduce the death toll in fatal road accidents worldwide
2) To provide blood in emergency situations anywhere it is needed
3) To reduce waiting lists of organ transplant patients in all countries
4) To eradicate blood disorders like Thalassemia from world by year 2030
5) To make all life-saving services available on every mobile phone in the world to empower people and boost their confidence to save their own lives
6) To assist United Nations and governments in all countries in their disaster management efforts in deadly situations like earthquake, Tsunami, wild-fires, flood as well as riots, wars, revolutions for saving Human lives, environment and property
7) Consolidate and network Global efforts of NGOs in all fields with focus on the field of disaster management, Blood donation, Thalassemia, other blood disorders, Organ donation, eye donation, body donation etc.
name: APPRECIATING SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Problem: Drowsy driving is responsible for growing number of road fatalities, injuries and property damage. These lives should not be lost! We are currently exploring two customer segments: 1) Tech-savvy families concerned about safety of their children (16-24) or seniors (65+) with a history of such incidents 2) Fleet operators who cannot measure the fatigue of commercial drivers. 

Solution: TRISENSE is a steering wheel cover that detects fatigue/drowsiness and alerts the driver through haptic feedback. While driving, the user interacts only with the steering wheel cover, but we provide a phone app for them to check statistics after driving. In the event of ignored feedback, a Guardian Alert is given to the parent (app) or fleet operator (dashboard). These software solutions have potential integrations in wearables or electronic logging devices.
name: Vastra Inc.
